name: Bore Worm

traits.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The worm regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two attacks: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.

actions.name: Grinding Jaws
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 19 (3d6 + 9 damage) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

immune: bludgeoning (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
piercing (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
slashing (from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine)
